definition: bilateral/both shores/both sides/both coasts/Taiwan and mainland
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (media term used esp. since 1997)
PRC Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits (ARATS)
pinyin: Hai3 xia2 Liang3 an4 Guan1 xi5 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: The river banks were lined with people watching the boat race.
sentences.chinese: 河两岸站满了观看赛船的人群。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has pledged to give the promotion of cross-Strait relations higher priority.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府保证会把促进两岸关系放在优先的位置上。

sentences.english: Mr Chen said he hoped cro -strait dialogue could resume quickly.
sentences.chinese: 陈水扁表示希望两岸能够尽快恢复对话。

sentences.english: Every aspect for intercourse of physical education for both side's could open more.
sentences.chinese: 两岸体育交流的点线面，可以更加开放。

sentences.english: Numerous heroes lived on both sides of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 黄河两岸诞生了无数的英雄豪杰。

sentences.english: We believe that it is up to the people on both sides of the Strait to resolve their differences peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为要由海峡两岸人民和平解决他们的分歧。

sentences.english: Time is the sea, to push us on both sides so far away.
sentences.chinese: 时间昰海，将莪们推向两岸，距离那么远。

sentences.english: Is Taipei Songshan a suitable airport for cross-strait direct flight?
sentences.chinese: 台北松山机场是否适合成为两岸的直航机场？

sentences.english: Offices will open across the Straits.
sentences.chinese: 海峡两岸将互设办事机构。

sentences.english: And 5 different style of the bridge between the East and West will be closely linked together.
sentences.chinese: 而5座风格迥异的大桥又将东西两岸紧紧连在一起。

sentences.english: The river, the banks of which are covered with trees flows to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这条河流入大海，河的两岸种满了树。

sentences.english: So I would like to know if, Mr. President, are you supportive of improved cross-straits relations?
sentences.chinese: 因此，总统先生，我想知道您是否支持改善两岸关系。

sentences.english: Lotus Fairy Lake in cross-strait people live under the care of a happy and peaceful life.
sentences.chinese: 湖两岸百姓在莲花仙子的呵护下过着美满祥和的生活。

sentences.english: South central Sweden is a thing is close to the sea the peninsula, middle high, both banks are low.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典中南部是一个东西濒海的半岛，中间高，两岸低。

sentences.english: References to waterways, transport and the communication of the three geographic areas were all considered.
sentences.chinese: 名称可让人想到水路，运输，两岸三地的连接渠道等。

sentences.english: By 2011, pit mines surrounded the Athabasca River.
sentences.chinese: 到2011年阿萨巴斯卡河两岸已是矿坑遍布。

definition: opposite bank (of a body of water)
(separated only by) a narrow strip of water
Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
Machia township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
